title: Cries from the Earth
description: The newest volume in this series recounts the outbreak of the Nez Perce War, featuring the beloved recurring character, the Irish scout Seamus Donegan. Johnston's fans will also welcome the return of Colonel Samuel Marr, an old Plainsmen hero who becomes involved in the friction between gold miners and the Nez Perce in Idaho. With compelling authenticity and his trademark realism, Johnston captures every emotion on both sides as tension between Crazy Horse and the U.S. Army erupt into war as this powerful saga continues.
author: Terry C. Johnston
